entry.message: [info] Activation of plug-in XBRL rule processor (xule) successful, version Check version using Tools->Xule->Version on the GUI or --xule-version on the command line. - xule

[info] Activation of plug-in Inline XBRL Document Set successful, version 1.1. - inlineXbrlDocumentSet

[DQC.IFRS.0102.9540] Varat with a value of 159,903,000 is not equal to the combined total of Current Assets and Noncurrent assets ( 9,812,000 + 130,191,000 ) with a value of 140,003,000. These values should be equal. If assets held for sale is included in the Statement of Financial Position presentation, then consider using CurrentAssetsOtherThanAssetsOrDisposalGroupsClassifiedAsHeldForSaleOrAsHeldForDistributionToOwners instead of current assets. The properties of this ifrs-full:Assets fact are: Period :2019-12-31 Dimensions : Unit : EUR Decimals of Assets : -3 Decimals of Current Assets : -3 Decimals of Non Current Assets : -3

[DQC.IFRS.0105.9556] The following elements are in the presentation linkbase of [00020] - Statement - ComprehensiveIncomeNetOfTax but are not included in any calculation relationship in the filing. ifrs-full:ComprehensiveIncomeAttributableToOwnersOfParent, ifrs-full:ComprehensiveIncomeAttributableToNoncontrollingInterests All elements appearing in the face of the financial statements should be included in a calculation relationship somewhere in the filing.
This rule will produce an error irrespective of a fact value being entered for the item(s) listed above.
Rule Element Id:9556 Rule version: 17.0.0 -

[DQC.IFRS.0129.9601] It is expected that RetainedEarnings with a value of -16,737,000 reported in the network role http://www.ovaro.fi/role/StatementOfFinancialPosition should be equal to the dimensionally qualified concept, Equity with the dimension ifrs-full:ComponentsOfEquityAxis = ifrs-full:RetainedEarningsMember and a reported value of -23,114,000 multiplied by 1. This value appears in the network role http://www.ovaro.fi/role/StatementOfChangesInEquity. This error occurs when the dimensionally qualified fact is not equal to the value input for the non dimensional item.
The properties of this ifrs-full:RetainedEarnings fact are:
Period : 2019-12-31 Dimensions : Unit : EUR Decimals of RetainedEarnings : -3 Decimals of Equity : -3 Rule version: 17.0.0 - https://filings.xbrl.org/529900C4P88APHFZ5H47/2020-12-31/ESEF/FI/0/OVARO-2020-12-31_fi.zip/OVARO-2020-12-31_fi/reports/OVARO-2020-12-31_fi.html 8041
